titleStmt.title: The tythe-takers cart overthrown or, The downfall of tythes. Proved that they are not to be payd now, either to the appropriate or impropriate parsons or persons. Pen'd for the general satisfaction and easement of all the people of England. By D. Lupton, servant of Christ Jesus in the work of the Gospel.
titleStmt.author: Lupton, Donald, d. 1676.

titleStmt.title: The tythe-takers cart overthrown or, The downfall of tythes. Proved that they are not to be payd now, either to the appropriate or impropriate parsons or persons. Pen'd for the general satisfaction and easement of all the people of England. By D. Lupton, servant of Christ Jesus in the work of the Gospel.
titleStmt.author: Lupton, Donald, d. 1676.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by J.M. for R. Harford, at the Bible and States arms in Little Brirain [sic],

notesStmt.note: The first and last leaves are blank.
Annotation on Thomason copy: "March. 27 1651"; the '2' in the imprint has been crossed out.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
